import { Subtitle, BrowserWindow } from "../../src/components";
import { DemoUseAutoId } from "./demos";

<Subtitle>Generate automatic IDs to facilitate WAI-ARIA</Subtitle>

The `useAutoId` hook creates an autogenerated unique id for an element. An id from props can used instead of the autogenerated id when available.

<BrowserWindow>
	<DemoUseAutoId />
</BrowserWindow>
<br />

### Usage

```jsx
import { useAutoId } from "@feedzai/react-a11y-tools";

...
// Auto-generated Id
const generatedId = useAutoId();

(or)

// Auto-generated Id, with a prefix
const generatedId = useAutoId(undefined, "fdz-js-component");

(or)

// An pre-defined id (from props), with a prefix
const generatedId = useAutoId(props.id, "fdz-js-component");


...

return (
	<button id={generatedId} {...htmlProps}>{htmlProps.children}</button>
);
```
